name: The Facility (itch) (CodyBrealey)
description:
This is my first real project, the Facility. All of the spriting, scripting, and sound design was done by me from scratch.

===========================================

I plan to release three "parts" for this game, with each featuring new environments, enemies, and weapons. The current game features part one, and part two will be made once part one is less buggy and has a soundtrack.

Currently, the game lacks a soundtrack, as I do not have any experience/skill when it comes to creating music.  I am going to look into getting one made once I have made the game less buggy. 

===========================================

This is my first proper project, so expect some bugs. I have made sure that there were no completely game breaking ones, but just, you know, look out.

Any helpful criticism is appreciated.
